Module com.example.schedulingdesktopapplication
Package com.example.schedulingdesktopapplication.controller

Class AddCustomerController

java.lang.Object
com.example.schedulingdesktopapplication.controller.AddCustomerController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AddCustomerController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class that adds customers in the application.
